column1: # Global glacier mass changes from 1961 to 2016                                                #
# Area_AW_ref_km2: regional area (km2) based on RGI60 and area-weighted change rate            #
# dM_INT_Gt: global mass change (Gt yr-1) based on spatial interpolation                       #
# sig_Glac_Gt: uncertainty related to glaciological variability (Gt yr-1)                      #
# sig_Geod_Gt: uncertainty related to geodetic value (Gt yr-1)                                 #
# sig_Int_Gt: uncertainty related to regional interpolation (Gt yr-1)                          #
# sig_Area_Gt: uncertainty related to regional glacier area (Gt yr-1)                          #
# sig_Total_Gt: Total uncertainty of regional mass change (Gt yr-1)                            #
# dM_INT_SLE: global mass change in equivalents of mean global sea-level rise (mm SLE yr-1)    #
# sig_Total_SLE: Total uncertainty in equivalents of mean global sea-level rise (mm SLE yr-1)  #
